org.redkale.net.http

类 WebSocketServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.redkale.net.Servlet<HttpContext,HttpRequest,HttpResponse>
      • org.redkale.net.http.HttpServlet
        • org.redkale.net.http.WebSocketServlet

  • public abstract class WebSocketServlet
extends HttpServlet
     当WebSocketServlet接收一个TCP连接后，进行协议判断，如果成功就会创建一个WebSocket。

                                    WebSocketServlet
                                            |
                                            |
                          WebSocketEngine & WebSocketNode
                                    /             \
                                 /                  \
                              /                       \
                     WebSocketGroup1            WebSocketGroup2
                        /        \                /        \
                      /           \             /           \
               WebSocket1     WebSocket2   WebSocket3    WebSocket4

    详情见: http://redkale.org
